titles.title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to provide for the complete use of visas available under the diversity transition program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 2/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Immigration Act of 1990 to extend the diversity transition program.
